content.question: Using the information presented in the graph, what is most likely the reason for the fall in the strength of the conditioned response in trials 16-20?

choices.label: The CS and the US are continuing to be paired together.
The CS and US are no longer being paired together.

content.answer: The CS and US are no longer being paired together.

skill.text: 3.A: Identify psychology-related concepts in descriptions or representations of data.
